description:
Sawatari Makoto is a member of the disciplinary committee, working under http://anidb.net/ch75356 [Misumi Rin]. She looks after Rin like http://anidb.net/ch75362 [Karen] does with http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Ui].
Makoto also has a collection of pictures of Rin in embarrassing situations.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Sawatari Makoto
